longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports must be valid for a minimum of 6 months from the
  arrival date. 
 - Other documents accepted for entry must be valid on
   arrival. 

Visa required. 

Minors:
- Only applicable to Venezuelan minors or foreign minors born
  in Venezuela:  
Additional Information:
- Dual nationals of Venezuela . 
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Extension of stay possible:
 - for additional 90 days for nationals of Equatorial Guinea.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required. 

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis. malaria risk, mainly due to P. vivax,
  is moderate to high throughout the year in some rural areas
  of Amazonas, Anzoategui, Bolivar and Delta Amacuro states.
  There is low risk in Apure, Monagas, Sucre and Zulia. Risk
  of P. falciparum malaria is restricted to municipalities in
  jungle areas of Amazonas (Alta Orinoco, Atabapo, Atures,
  Autana, Manapiare) and Bolivar (Cedeno, El Callao, Heres,
  Gran Sabana, Piar, Raul Leoni, Rocio, Sifontes and Sucre).
  Recommended prevention: B in P. vivax risk areas; C in P.
  falciparum risk areas.
